thread.title_full: Egypt vs Cameroon LIVE Commentary - 2/5/17 Africa Cup of Nations - Goal.com

title: Egypt vs Cameroon LIVE Commentary - 2/5/17 Africa Cup of Nations - Goal.com
text: Commentary Main events 2' EARLY CHANCE FOR EGYPT!!! Salah releases El Said, who fires towards goal, but Ondoa makes a fine save. 1' Formalities are over and we should be starting with the business of the day shortly. Now, for the singing of National Anthems... STAT: Egypt and Cameroon are meeting for the 10th time in the African Cup of Nations; the Pharaohs won four games to Cameroonâ€™s three. This is the 31st Africa Cup of Nations final. The crown will either go to Egypt, who are chasing a record eighth title or Cameroon, who last won this trophy in 1984. The two teams are gettinng ready to make their way onto the pitch. Cameroon starting XI: Ondoa, Onyongo, Ngadeu-Ngadjui, Fai, Teikeu, Siani, Sutchuin Djourn, Bassogog, Zoua, Moukandjo and Tambe. Egypt starting XI: Essam El Hadary, Ahmed Fathy, Ahmed Hegazi, Ali Gabr, Mohamed Salah, Mohamed El Nenny, Ahmed El Mohamady, Tarek Hamed, Amr Warda, Trezeguet and Abdalla El Said. Let's take a look at how both teams have lined up, starting with Egypt... TEAM NEWS: Cameroon have named an unchanged line-up, and it will be interesting to see which formation they will use against The Pharaohs. TEAM NEWS: Egypt have made two changes to the team that beat Burkina Faso in the semi-finals. Ibrahim Salah and Kahraba have both made way for Mohamed El Nenny and Amr Warda respectively. Hi everyone, welcome to our live coverage of the Afcon 2017 final between Egypt and Cameroon. I am Ernest Makhaya, and I will be your host tonight. Live Now
